overview: When is the last time you've seen an All American, bareback, collegeboy orgy video? Then again, can you name any? Cobra takes the boyz from the Beach and adds Austin (who makes his last modeling appearance) to make this summer sexfest a very memorable time indeed. It's all live sound with NO music, so you get to hear everything from the boyz' breath to their every moan and groan, and they sure did act up a lot on this one! The boyz throw Armon an 18th birthday party, but you'll have to see who really gets the gifts!
title: Bareback Twink Orgy
